item.title: Pumpkin Bread
item.description: Ingredients: 1 3/4 cups white sugar 3/4 cups brown sugar (try experimenting with a heavier brown sugar ratio) 1 cup butter [!tip] Original recipe calls for corn oil but I don’t regularly carry that 4 beaten eggs 1 can pumpkin 3 1/2 cups flour 1 tsp baking powder 2 tsp baking soda 2 tsp salt 1 tsp cl...

item.title: Banana Bread
item.description: Ingredients: 1 cup butter 3/4 cup sugar 3 large overripe bananas (or 4 medium), mashed 2 eggs 2 cups flour 1 tsp baking soda \ Instructions: Combine butter (room temp/melted) and sugar.

item.title: Sweet Potato Casserole
item.description: 5 large sweet potatoes 1/2 stick of butter 1/2 cup brown sugar (to taste) 2 eggs Pinch of salt Preheat oven at 350.

item.title: Steelhead Trout
item.description: Big fillet steelhead trout 3 tbsp melted butter or oil Lemon juice Spices (herbes de Provence style or Cajun/old bay style) 3-4 garlic cloves, minced 1/2 tsp dried dill weed Salt and pepper to taste Lemon slices for topping Preheat oven to 375°F.

item.title: Caramel Pie
item.description: 1 graham cracker crust (8in) 2 cans (28 oz) Sweetened Condensed Milk Cool Whip (optional to top; about 1/2 tub) Remove paper from cans.

item.title: Basque Cheesecake
item.description: 1 3/4 cups sugar (1 cup granulated and 3/4 cup brown) 2 1/4 lbs (36 oz) cream cheese at room temperature 1/4 tsp salt 5 eggs 2 cups heavy cream 1/4 cup all purpose flour 1 tbsp vanilla Preheat oven at 400 degrees.

item.title: Grammy's Red Velvet Cake
item.description: 1/2 cup vegetable shortening 1.5 cups sugar 2 eggs (room temp) 1 tsp salt 2 tsp cocoa 1 cup buttermilk (room temp) 2 oz food coloring (1 oz bottle + 1 oz water) 2.5 cups flour 1 tsp vanilla 1 tsp soda in 1 tbsp vinegar Preheat oven at 350.

item.title: Brittany's Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: 2 1/3 cups all purpose flour 1 cup brown sugar 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg, beaten 1 egg yolk 1 tsp baking soda 1 tbsp corn starch 1 tsp salt 1 tbsp vanilla 3/4 cup unsalted butter (room temp/melted) 1 cup chocolate chips Preheat oven at 325.

item.title: Chocolate Cake
item.description: 1 stick butter 1 cup water 1/4 cup cocoa 1/2 cup vegetable oil 1/2 tsp salt 1 tsp baking soda 2 eggs 1 tsp vanilla 1/2 cup buttermilk 2 cups all purpose flour 2 cups sugar Preheat oven at 375.
